TopicTitle: Top Gun AI - The Official Tournament Thread

Articles.Content:
I did tests with the missile and the bullet and most of the time, the bullet just use missile to blow my up, but once the bullet is out of missiles, my plane seems to be able to use their guns to take down both.

- - - Updated - - -

And even though they were shot down, both managed to land, quite impressive.
I had no problems with either, and the proto 3 was able to kill the missile and bullet on its own.
I got absolutely murder by them...probably need to learn more about fighter jets and aerodynamics...Or dissect someone's plane and study it.
Try removing the bullet from play after it uses missiles. Otherwise, it is a 2v2 with a dead plane.

I updated one of my xiphos.

Also when starting out a match it best to edit the save so that all planes start at once by making pilotEnabled = true. Thus no plane as a start advantage/disadvantage.

I'm done, I got no more time to dedicate to this, off to work.

It shouldnt have a gun or ammo on it...

I looked at the parts list page on kerbalx (because I was too lazy to open kerbal to see if I had put one on) and there was no ammo or gun on it.

The points I listed also had no gun on it.

My rational for having so many missiles is that in my testing, it was not possible for anything to dodge aamrams unless the craft was very very small, and then only sometimes. So I had a lot of missiles on a really fast plane that would draw all of the missiles away from the slow to take off Missile and possibly take down one of the two other planes. Then the missile would use its missiles and gun to clean up any small planes that remained. I admit that both could have been done better but I thought this was going to fill up quick and didnt want to be the seventeenth entry...
Missiles are for wimps. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Its very easy to dodge missiles, the problem is you need a very fast high T/W craft OR you need to set Steer factor very low so the plane does not loss speed maneuvering, but the AI is so limited at this time that it won't adjust the steer factor in accordance to dodging missiles vs attacking, so if the steer factor is set low you plane will lack the maneuverability to attack, especially with cannons.

Wing clipping is banned to prevent people from sticking all their wings inside their plane, or sticking all their wings inside their other wings, because doing that allows the plane to retain a small surface area, making it hard to hit, while still having the lift of an Albatross.
